escalate: ESC if cx wants their account name to be changed
ESC if cx complains that their order was canceled
If cx's ask when their order will arrive/estimated delivery date
‚ûú  Ask what shipping method they selected at checkout
‚ûú If it's standard shipping use STS shortcut
‚ûú If they insist to know exactly when ESC
Cx gets a code for free shipping for the first purchase; you can escalate any issues after troubleshooting
tone: Don't thank the cx for the purchase, thank them for their continuous support
Don't ask the customer to contact the courier
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when the cx already made a purchase
promo_and_exclusions: Free shipping code is only valid for standard shipping
Standard shipping charge is usually ~ $20, if you see a charge higher than that, it means the method selected is NOT standard (create a mock cart to double-check)

Let me know if you have any questions!

-Jordan
Jordan, bought a pair of these but your shipper can't seem to get their act together(FedEx). I have initiated a return because your shipper is so incompetent.

It doesn't take 4 business days to deliver a package that was 6 hours away. First their tracking said package would be delivered last Friday...then it says Saturday and now it says next Tuesday....ordered on Jan 1 and still don't have them.

Sam Edelman: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear about this. Since you've already initiated the return, you're all set on that end. But if you'd prefer help placing a replacement order, I'm here to support however I can.

I initiated the return but I am no longer at the hotel address that I was at when I placed the order. I would like you to make sure that FedEx DOES NOT deliver the order to a hotel I am no longer at to accept the package.
I could no longer pay and stay at a location just to wait longer for a package.
The address was 6848 E Camelback Rd Scottsdale AZ 85251 (this is a Motel 6)

Sam Edelman: I'm really sorry for all the inconvenience. Since the package is already with the carrier, it's best to contact them directly. Have you tried giving them a call? They should have the most up-to-date information.
I have already contacted FedEx and they said to contact the shipper....which is you and I am not taking on a new part time job doing business with your company.
This has left a VERY bad taste in my mouth by the way and I can't be the first customer to say this. FedEx isn't going to string me along and neither are you.

That package was in Tempe (less than 10 miles from the delivery location at 2:20am yesterday. Not only did they not deliver it yesterday, they are now saying it will be 3 business days into next week before they deliver it. Find a company that does better and don't expect your customers to put up with this. There was no way I'm hell I or anyone else is going to pay for 3 more days in a hotel while FedEx strings them along.
Correction....I meant 2 more business days..Including Sunday that would be the extra 3 days in a hotel.

Sam Edelman: I do understand and would like to apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check with my team regarding possible options and recommendations. To help with this, can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number, and your zip code, please?
Anne Mecke; annemecke@yahoo.com;; (775) 564+3357;zip was 85251; order # (don't have wifi right now....will send in a separate text.
Will also send FedEx tracking #
Sam Edelman: Thanks for the info. I will wait for the order number and tracking number as well.
Yes sir. Thank you for listening to my feedback.
Sam Edelman: Don't mention it, I am willing to help you anytime.
We may have a big problem ...I got a text this morning that says the package is out for delivery today.
And an email....
Sam Edelman: Sorry for the trouble! Let me check with my team on what we can do. I'll wait for the order number.
I just sent pictures of order # and tracking #
Sam Edelman: Thanks for the info! I will pass this along to my team and get back to you as soon as possible, hang tight!
Ok thank you.üôÇ
Sam Edelman: You're welcome! Have a great day for now.
The hotel just called me; they refused the package. I would assume it will be enroute back to Sam Edelman. Please let me know when you process my refund.

Sam Edelman: Thank you for sharing that update. I'm so sorry this happened, and I completely understand how inconvenient this must be for you. I've passed this information along to my team and will follow up as soon as I hear back from them regarding your concern. I truly appreciate your patience while we get this sorted.

Thanks for all your help. Any update on my order 89663? I'm not receiving any updates on the status and haven't received my jewelry yet.

Anna Beck: You're welcome, and I apologize for that. Could you let me know when you placed your order and if you received any tracking info? Sometimes our emails can end up in your spam or promo folder, so please check there as well. If it also helps, our processing time takes 1-2 business days, and we usually ship via UPS. Once shipped, it will take 5-7 business days for domestic orders.
Order was placed on 12/26/25

Anna Beck: Thank you for sharing that photo. As explained before, this order was part of our Sample Sale. Our artisans in Bali carefully prepare the Sample Sale items, and due to the high volume of holiday shipping, transit times have been longer than usual. I'll check it again with my team to get an update. We appreciate your patience, and I'll be in touch.

I accidentally placed my order under a different email (languagelark@gmail.com) since I was on my phone when I made the purchase. It's under my same name and billing address. Is there a way to change it to my monicaji1@gmail.com?
Liked ‚ÄúThank you for sharing that photo. As explained bef...‚Äù

Anna Beck: I understand your concern, and I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience. Let me resend the message I sent yesterday, just in case you missed it. 

"Thanks for your patience. I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. Sorry, but order 89663 was placed under a different email address, and we can't change it so it won't be in your account."

I'm truly sorry about this.
How unfortunate. This was purchased as a gift for my mom's birthday and I've never had a sample sale item take a month to arrive.
Anna Beck: My sincere apologies for all these. Rest assured, I'm reaching out to my team, and I'll be in touch the moment I get an update about the status of your order.
